content: 2 decrease double_crochet decrease 6 using black yarn make two long kristel koevenig fell in love with crochet when she discovered amigurumi now she designs row 18 decrease double_crochet 2 decrease 4 stitches into the nose to create the her own amigurumi patterns often inspired by tv video games books and other popular tie off leave long tail for sewing nostrils culture in her words it s the best addiction in the world see more of kristel s designs at www ravelry com/designers/kristel-koevenig › 36 creative craft series amigurumi creative craft series amigurumi 37
